text: I want to thanks the excellent service and friendly staff Linda and Kuan for assisting me. I will back to this shop again.

Very friendly staff. Greeted me and asked if I needed help upon entering. A pity that I didn't manage to get her name.

Quite a small outlet, but I feel that it provides adequate variety in the neighborhood Elias mall

Needed an urgent buy but store closed earlier than expected. Canâ€™t talk it out as I already knew what to buy. Unlucky of me. Should have written or adjust the operating time to 2150hrs instead. Wasted my time and effort for rushing down.

There is a female staff there named Liang, who is unprofessional in handling customers needs. She's loud n extremely rude. My opinion is that if employer pays peanuts, they get monkeys!!!! Pet Lovers Centre at Elias Mall dont deserved even one star!!!!!

Spent $137 on Saturday 9th January 2021 on several items. They gave 2 packs of Fish 4 Dogs samples for my babies to try. Fed them at 7pm on the same night, my youngest boy started vomiting for more than 7 times and my elder boy started vomiting at 2am for more than 3 times. Both boys had diarrhea. Sent a complain to Pet Lovers Centre via whatsapp and facebook, the only response they gave was sorry. After what my boys went through its just one sorry? I'm seriously disappointed!!
